sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' const Employes = ({item ,index, handelDelet}) => { const handelDelet1 = (index) => { handelDelet(index) } return ( <> {item.name} {item.email} {item.address} {item.phone} {/* اظهار قائمة اضافة موظف جديد */} Add Employee ) } export default Employes;
